cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
Excellent condition, only 60k miles. Standard transmission, power everything, and great gas mileage
Beautiful pearl white exterior, white leather inside, and tinted windows.  Powerful V8 engine and sexy look.  Small damage to driver's side door.
This car sucks. You can't tell, but it has been in an accident and it will slowly fall apart on you.
The perfect first car.  Durable, dependable, and easy on the pocket.  This will get you from A to B, and even has a fun e-brake for making donuts in the snow.  Just be careful.
